title: Titanic II
description: In a triumphant return, Titanic sails again with hopes history does not repeat itself. Narrated by Al Gore.
quote: Due to man’s excessive use of fossil fuels, climate change had rendered the iceberg nothing more than a small cube.
alt1: two men with binoculars in a crow’s nest point with concerned looks
alt2: the ship is approaching an iceberg
alt4: the ship breaks through the tiny iceberg with no problem
